The figures shown communicate the Yoruba belief that
choicesHtml: mothers should remain with their children even after they have reached adulthood
elite women are the bards and keepers of dynastic history at the royal courts
mothers of young kings act as regents until the king is old enough to make adult decisions
royal wives support and sustain the health of a community and the power of the king
